thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dladinski
title: Great location
text: Friendly staff, nice boutique hotel and animal friendly! They have a cozy lobby and bar as well as a full restaurant. The hotel is located within walking distance of Central Park and several museums. I've been staying there for years, ever since it was the On The Ave. Hotel. Much of the staff has been there for years, so it's always a friendly place to return. I would definitely recommend.
